Reviews.Title: Not sharp
Reviews.Author: M. Parr
Reviews.Content: I wasn't satisfied with the HD picture no matter how I adjusted the brightness, sharpness, contrast,color,etc. And I couldn't get any audio to my analog amp so I could listen to my external speakers.  When I tried to stream shows from my computer to this t.v, I got video but no audio.Most of the instruction manual and cd is dedicated to the EzSign computer setup.  This t.v. is basically for businesses so they can run their advertisements (EzSign),and not home use.I get better video and audio from my Olevia t.v.

ProductInfo.Features:
TV Type: LED
Screen Size Class: 37"
Vertical Resolution: 1080p
Maximum Resolution: 1920 x 1080
Screen Refresh Rate: 60Hz
ProductInfo.Name: LG EzSign 37LT560E 37 1080p LED-LCD TV - 16:9 - HDTV 1080p
